question: Each underlined word in the following text is incorrect. Write the correct word in the space provided.
q: The grade nine students of our school {have} planned
to play a cricket match yesterday. Everyone {were}
present in time. However, just before {a} match, it
started raining. They waited at least {of} two hours,
but the rain did not {stopped}. They were very
{sadly}. At the end, they decided to play cricket on the following day.
